text: Lenon Farias de Souza Leite (born 10 January 1996), commonly known as Lenon, is a Brazilian footballer who currently plays as a forward for General Díaz. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |rowspan="3"|Club Guaraní |2018 |rowspan="2"|Paraguayan Primera División |4||0||0||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||4||0 |- |2019 |8||0||0||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||8||0 |- ! colspan="2" |Total !12!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!12!!0 |- |General Díaz |2019 |Paraguayan Primera División |1||0||0||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||1||0 |- ! colspan="3" |Career total !13!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!13!!0 |} ;Notes ==References== Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Ascenso MX players Category:Mirassol Futebol Clube players Category:Araxá Esporte Clube players Category:Club Guaraní players Category:General Díaz footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Paraguay Category:Expatriate footballers in Paraguay
